machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;ELEGOO NEPTUNE 3
M220 S100 ;Set the feed speed to 100%
M104 S{material_print_temperature_preheat} ;Preheat the hot end
M190 S{material_bed_temperature} ;Wait for hot bed temperature
M109 S{material_print_temperature} ;Wait for the hot end temperature
G90
G92 Z0;
G1 Z5 F100;Lift the Z axis
G28 ;home
;M420 S1 Z50;Uncomment to enable progressive compensation height of 50mm
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 Z0.8 F300
G1 X1.5 Y20 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 Y120.0 F500.0 E30 ;Draw the first line
G1 X0.5 F1000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 Y20 F500 E45 ;Draw the second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative positionning
G1 E-2 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 E-10 X5 Y5 Z3 F3000 ;Retract
G90 ;Absolute positionning
G1 X0 Y{machine_depth} ;Present print
M106 S0 ;Turn-off fan
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M84;Disable all steppers
